text: "(Don't Go Back To) Rockville" is a 1984 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and is the second and final single from their second studio album Reckoning. It did not chart in the United States or the United Kingdom. == Track listings == All songs written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe. European singles #"(Don't Go Back To) Rockville" (Edit) – 3:55 #"Wolves, Lower" – 4:14 #"9-9" (Live)1 (12" only) #"Gardening at Night" (Live)1 (12" only) US singles #"(Don't Go Back To) Rockville" (Edit) – 3:55 #"Catapult" (Live)2 === Notes === 1 Recorded at the Theater El Dorado, Paris, France, April 20, 1984. 2 Recorded at the Music Hall, Seattle, Washington, June 27, 1984. == References == Category:1984 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:R.E.M. songs
title: (Don't Go Back To) Rockville
